about_the_game:
About ExMORTALIS

ExMORTALIS is a chilling First-Person Action RPG set in the Gothic town of Las Tormentas in 1893. Ascend the ominous El Dedo del Diablo, a crumbling tower where the Necrotechs—a shadowy collective of engineers, doctors, and scientists—pursue horrifying experiments to transcend human limitations. Witness their obsession transform the town and its people into a living nightmare.

EXPLORE

  • Immerse yourself in a body horror narrative where your choices shape the outcome.

  • Traverse the tower’s labyrinthine biomes, overrun with failed experiments, as you uncover the dark secrets of the ExMortalis Project and the chaos it unleashed.

SCAVENGE

  • Awaken as a patient tethered to the mysterious Necrobiotic Serum, exploring the tower to piece together your past through scattered notes and evidence.

  • Decide your fate: embrace mutations by succumbing to sleep, or remain awake to save lives and unlock new side objectives.

SURVIVE

  • Customize your playstyle with unique implants and augments that influence your abilities, reputation, and the services available from the townsfolk.

  • Upgrade your gear and master skills through Tomes of Life and Death to overcome escalating challenges.

FIGHT

  • Wield an arsenal of weapons, from the devastating Winchester 1893 Shotgun to the experimental Tesla Coil Gatling Gun, each with distinct effects and strategies.

  • Battle Proto-Mutants—twisted remnants of Necrotech experiments—each with their own names and tragic backstories.

HIDE

  • Employ stealth tactics to outmaneuver enemies with acute senses and deadly abilities.

  • Use the environment and your tools wisely to evade detection and survive the Necrotechs' horrors.

short_description: Awaken in the Gothic town of Las Tormentas, in 1893, and face biotech horrors in a crumbling tower. ExMORTALIS is a First-Person ARPG inspired by System Shock and Prey. Explore, fight, scavenge, survive. Unlock mutations, forge powerful implants, uncover dark secrets, and shape your destiny.
